mapper.select: select org.id, org.name, org.duty, org.leader, org.leader_tel, org.note, nature.id config_id, nature.value config_value, nature.order config_order from supervision_org org left join relation_supervision_org_nature relation on relation.org_id = org.id left join config_supervision_org_nature nature on nature.id = relation.nature_id where org.id = #{id}
SELECT t.id from supervision_org t where t.`name`=#{name}
